modName: Spider and Co - Mounts and Followers
summary: With this mod you can summon Spider and Co. Mounts and Followers wherever you want.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size="7"] Spider and Co - Mounts and Followers [/size][/b] [/color] [color=#00ff00]version 2.4

Optional Files: Esp version Française [/color]


Spider and Co. allow you to summon Spider, Spider Daedra, Arachne, Cold Arachne, Mudcrab, Roach, Ant, Scorpio, Chaurus, Spectral Spider, Spectral Mudcrab and a Spectral Chaurus, Mounts and (-simple-) Followers wherever you want.

You can easily DISMISS when you want with a "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Spider"

You can find the 7 Followers (with speech): Centipede, Ant, Crawler, Insecto, Scorpio, Rivercrab and Forest Spider, in the Riften Stable

[img]https://i.imgur.com/ja6cdww.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000]INSTALLATION (very important)[/color]

You must place the .esp at the bottom of the list when you launch the game to obtain the 13 books

You can find the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX” and the "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Spider" at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun/Blancherive) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

Duration of the summon: 1 hour

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=459651summonSPIDERANDCO4.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/459651summonSPIDERANDCO4.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000]Bugs or Problems[/color]

1) You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have "lost" the “active” Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

2) With Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster, or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) when you launch the game

3) If you have any problem with these mounts, you can try a FAST TRAVEL...

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=162315summonSPIDERANDCO2.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/162315summonSPIDERANDCO2.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000]Credits[/color]

Muppetpuppet for the meshes and the textures of the Centipede, the Rivercrab and the Forest Spider of the mod:
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=10738]Moonpath to Elsweyr [/url] (« use everything you want »)

Dogtown1 for the meshes and textures of: Ant, Scorpio, Roach, Crawler, Insecto; in his [url=http://www.moddb.com/mods/skymomod-v12]SkyMoMod[/url]

Vicn for his mod [url=http://naaaaikikvicnvicn.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-36.html] Vicn Creature Resource[/url] ( “You can use any parts of this mod without my permission. “) with Arachne and Cold Arachne + ECE Team,dimon99,Radioragae,REN,Peggy,NewSea,SKS

Mihail Romanov for the Spider Daedra in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88547/?]Spider Daedra- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons - oblivion - eso) [/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=674524summonSPIDERANDCO3.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/674524summonSPIDERANDCO3.jpg[/img][/url]



[b]Video with my mods [/b]([color=#00ff00]Giants, Gargoyles, Werewolves, Trolls, Spiders[/color])

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]KHQarwkN7qE[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-
